entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who received full marks on her paper and is present in the class.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is introduced as the teacher who is giving a lesson to the students.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as one of the houses in Hogwarts and Harry's house.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a student who received ten points for Gryffindor.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as one of the students in the class.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is mentioned as one of the students who stopped laughing when Lockhart placed a hand on the cover of the cage.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as one of the students in the class who was cowering in his front-row seat.

relationships.description: Lockhart teaches Hermione Granger, as evidenced by him giving her a paper to grade.
Lockhart is teaching Harry, as evidenced by the lesson he is giving in class.
Lockhart teaches Gryffindor house, as evidenced by him giving a lesson to the students from that house.
